Sentencas: Hydrogen electrode-supported tubular solid oxide cells (SOCs) were fabricated by dip-coating and co-sintering method.
Titulo: Optimization of the electrode-supported tubular solid oxide cells for application on fuel cell and steam electrolysis

Sentencas: The electrochemical properties of tubular SOCs were investigated both in fuel cell and electrolysis modes.
Titulo: Optimization of the electrode-supported tubular solid oxide cells for application on fuel cell and steam electrolysis

Sentencas: Ni-YSZ was employed as hydrogen electrode support.
Titulo: Optimization of the electrode-supported tubular solid oxide cells for application on fuel cell and steam electrolysis

Sentencas: The pore ratio of Ni-YSZ support strongly affected the performance of tubular SOCs, especially in steam electrolysis mode.
Titulo: Optimization of the electrode-supported tubular solid oxide cells for application on fuel cell and steam electrolysis

Sentencas: The pore ratio was adjusted by the content of pore-former in support slurry.
Titulo: Optimization of the electrode-supported tubular solid oxide cells for application on fuel cell and steam electrolysis

Sentencas: The results showed that 3 wt.% pore former content is the proper value to produce high performance both in fuel cell and electrolysis modes.
Titulo: Optimization of the electrode-supported tubular solid oxide cells for application on fuel cell and steam electrolysis

Sentencas: In fuel cell mode, the maximum power density reached 743.1 mW cm(-2) with H-2 (105 sccm) and O-2 (70 sccm) as working gases at 850 degrees C.
Titulo: Optimization of the electrode-supported tubular solid oxide cells for application on fuel cell and steam electrolysis

Sentencas: In electrolysis mode, as the electrolysis voltage was 1.3 V, the electrolysis current density reached 425 mA cm(-2) with H-2 (35 sccm) and N-2 (70 sccm) adsorbed 47% steam as working gases in hydrogen electrode at 850 degrees C.
Titulo: Optimization of the electrode-supported tubular solid oxide cells for application on fuel cell and steam electrolysis

Sentencas: The stability of tubular SOCs was related to the ratio of NiO/YSZ in the support.
Titulo: Optimization of the electrode-supported tubular solid oxide cells for application on fuel cell and steam electrolysis

Sentencas: The sample with NiO/YSZ = 60/40 shows a better performance than the sample with NiO/YSZ = 50/50.
Titulo: Optimization of the electrode-supported tubular solid oxide cells for application on fuel cell and steam electrolysis
